sense.name: individual who does specific work
sense.examples: He is an amazing worker of glass. The auto workers have gone on strike. The company laid off ten steel workers yesterday. The workers of John's painting business put in long hours in the summer. Who is the hardest worker of our group?

sense.name: generic member of a social class
sense.examples: Workers of the world unite! She feels that workers in our society are exploited. The modern worker has shorter hours and safer working conditions.

sense.name: sterile colony insect that cares for the young
sense.examples: The workers of that bee colony take honey to the larvae. The lives of the workers will be sacrificed to save the queen bee.
